DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical effectiveness SYSTANE® BALANCE compare REFRESH OPTIVE® Advanced subject lipid-deficient dry eye .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Outcomes Following Treatment With SYSTANE® BALANCE
DOC.criteria: Willing able attend study visit ; Must sign inform consent form ; Bestcorrected visual acuity ( BCVA ) 55 letter well eye assess use early treatment diabetic retinopathy study ( ETDRS ) chart ; Willing take study product direct entire study ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Women childbearing potential pregnant , plan become pregnant study , breast feeding , use adequate birth control method ; Contact lens use within 30 day prior Screening Visit , unwilling avoid contact lens use course study ; Use medication exclude protocol ; Diseases , illnesses , infection , ocular abnormality exclude protocol ; Ocular surgery procedure exclude protocol ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
